about_the_game:
A miniature world comes to holographic life
Experience a living, breathing tabletop video game that invites the player into a miniature universe full of small adventures set in beautifully handcrafted diorama battle boards inspired by Norse mythology. Experience the miniature figurines and tactical gameplay now in holographic 3D!



Tilt Five's AR technology allows players to physically move and manipulate their miniature figurines on the gameboard, just as they would with a traditional tabletop game, adding a strong sense of tactile interaction.


The Tilt Five™ holographic gaming system transforms video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments directly on your tabletop. Using the Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) glasses, Gameboard, and Wand controller, you can immerse yourself--and friends--in experiences like never before. Share and enjoy holograms together locally, remotely, or even stream them to your favorite social platforms using MixCast mixed-reality capture software.

Visit Tilt Five's website to find out more and to order your Tilt Five system! Experience Wartile in full holographic 3D today!

name: Wartile - Tilt Five Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel dual Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Wartile is a digital tabletop game well-suited to the Tilt Five system due to its focus on miniature figurines and tactical gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal, Danish
*languages with full audio support
